text: Abadi Hadis (6 November 1997 â€“ 5 February 2020) was an Ethiopian long-distance runner. He placed 15th over 10,000 metres at the 2016 Olympics. He won a bronze medal at the 2017 IAAF World Cross Country Championships. Hadis died on 5 February 2020 in Mekelle, Ethiopia at the age of 22. ==References== Category:1997 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Ethiopian athletes Category:Long-distance runners Category:Olympians for Ethiopia
title: Abadi Hadis
